nodes.documentation:
@notice It initializes this ATM Settings instance.
@param settingsAddress settings address.
nodes.name: initialize

getATMForMarket(address,address).return: the ATM address configured for a given market.

initialized().return: true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false.

isATMForMarket(address,address,address).return: true if the ATM is configured for the market. Otherwise it returns false.

isATMPaused(address).return: true if ATM is paused. Otherwise it returns false.

params.newAtmAddress: the new ATM address to update.

getATMForMarket(address,address).notice: Gets the ATM configured for a given market (borrowed token and collateral token).

initialize(address).notice: It initializes this ATM Settings instance.

initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

isATMForMarket(address,address,address).notice: Tests whether an ATM is configured for a given market (borrowed token and collateral token) or not.

isATMPaused(address).notice: Gets whether an ATM is paused (or the platform is paused) or not.

removeATMToMarket(address,address).notice: Removes the ATM address for a given market (borrowed token and collateral token).

setATMToMarket(address,address,address).notice: Sets an ATM for a given market (borrowed token and collateral token).

updateATMToMarket(address,address,addres.notice: Updates a new ATM for a given market (borrowed token and collateral token).

userdoc.notice: It manages the settings for the ATMs.
